title: Fast battery drain using mobile data
content:
While using mobile data my battery drains extremely fast. I get  1.5hrs OST. The battery will drop a percentage every few minutes with the screen off as well.

When using WIFI I get over 4hrs of OST. This wasn't an issue when using Android 7 but after 8 and 9 the battery drain while using mobile data had gotten worst.

Would replacing the battery fix this issue?

Thanks
